reviews.review: This game is amazing and will always be!!! must play
its a good game highly recommend
Love the game. also, tunneling and camping are not a thing. its called bait. Only toxic survivors complain about it because they cant survive. Play how you want and have fun.

Dead by Daylight is a game you can get addicted to real easily. You can play with friends or you can kill your friends, whatever you'd prefer.

BUT the biggest issue with this game, and for lower ranks it's a big issue, you'll ALWAYS be going against high ranks due to HORRIBLE matchmaking. It'll drive you to honestly want to quit the game. 
Also, to me, I wish there was a way you could talk to each other. Like a whisper mode, but the killer could hear it too. Kind of like how Friday the 13th had.
With constant improvements and updates, the developers are always looking to make this game enjoyable for its community.

Das Game hatte genug Bugs woran man hätte arbeiten müssen. Reaktion darauf? Außer die UI wurde das was  gut war wesentlich verschlechtert!

PS: Nicht wundern die Waffen der Killer sind maximal ca ein Meter lang (Axt von Huntress). Die Killer können dich aber trotzdem auf 4 Meter durch Objekte Töten. Und Paletten sind auch nur noch Deko :)
dead by daylight is an amazing game and has a great community and honestly i wish i had gotten it way before i did.

This is one of my favorite online games. I came for the Silent Hill content, and stayed for the thoughtful and unique lore put into every aspect of this game. Great gameplay experience, genuine scares sprinkled throughout, and a lot of fun to play with friends!

Extremely fun, scary at times and different to any other game I have played. 

I haven't been able to stop playing since I got it. Playing with friends makes it 10x more fun!

If you are either a sadist who loves killing people by putting them on meathooks or you are a masochist who loves getting hit by a big guy and get put on a meathook this game is for you. But I would recommend playing the survivor part of the game exclusively with friends because it is more fun that way.
Bastante divertido de se jogar com os amigos

I really wanted to recommend this game, but after years of playing (On PS4 and before that on PC) I gotta say, do not play this game... It's like a toxic relationship, you keep waiting for it to change, because you love it but it is clear the devs do not care about us. Not only do they refuse to hear us (The players who play this everyday), but they do not play their own game and yet they think they know whats best for it. 

Wich is a shame, because the art direction in this game is amazing, the visuals, sounds, themes. But cool visuals and cosmetics doesn't make up for a trash dev team.

um dos MELHORES JOGOS DA MINHA VIDA contando com resident evil 2 tambem INCRIVEL!!!!!, um jogo violento ate meu primo de 10 anos joga no xbox dele kkkkkkkkkk demais amo esse jogo e com certeza vai fazer parte da minha historia


ainda ta olhando? que foi compra logo o jogo!!!!!!!!
Hell No!! This game will forever be buggy DON'T BUY IT!! Spend your money on food instead!!!! BE WARNED!!!
My honest opinion is simple. Welcome to Dead by Buglight
It's fun. It's buggy. I love it.

me gustaria que implementaran algun tipo de herramienta de practica ademas de los tutoriales, como una herramienta de practica para practicar con los asesinos y probar de sus habilidades, ayudaria mucho para los jugadores nuevos.

Это игра просто кайф!! вас могут дважды натянуть на крюк сердцем, но стоит вашему товарищу потереть вашу спинку, то реген, как у росомахи. Однако если вас поймали за трусы в момент прыжка через окно, то гг. Вас будто базукой шмальнули! Какое бы у вас не было состояние, ваши трусы - это ваше сердце!! А на счет тимы - все еще круче: челы роняют все доски к чертям собачьим, а после подыхают. Некоторые еще после игры напишут "дольше всех мансил, тима даунов, я сын туп*й *****". В общем, наслаждайтесь)

No fajna giera ale jak chcesz się trochę spocić i wbić lepszą rangę (chodzi tu o survivora) no to powodzenia bo ci psycha siądzie z dwóch powodów:
1.Useles ludzie z drużyny
2.hitboxy są tak rozwalone że no normalnie przeskakujesz jak szew okno siu! I nagle jeb! Siekiera w głowie,leżysz nieprzytomny i i krzyczysz na cały pokój że 7 dych poszło w dupe
No a jak grasz kilerem to grasz kilerem noże w plecy,siekiery rzucasz no wtedy git jest
Pretty good game if you like games in the horror genre. Jump scares. Exciting.
Jogo ótimo, pena que não tem cross save (PC Xbox) (PC PS) (Xbox PS)

Gedanke ist gut. Das Spiel hat Potential. Leider werden falsche Entscheidungen von den machen getroffen: 
So muss man reales Geld bezahlen um einen anderen Charakter zu spielen.
Killer und Überlebendeskills sind nicht ausgeglichen. 

Das schlimmste sind die 30min. Wartezeit, nur um ein Match über Crossplay, bei aktuellen über 50.000 Spielern online

還常常發生一起組隊但沒有全員進去的狀況

very addicting, I first found the roblox version of this game and I loved it, I played it every day. Imagine my surprise when I found this-this pot of gold. Truly, God has blessed me

very good game , and it gives you diabetes XD
This game makes me unreasonably angry, and for that I give it a thumbs up

Find some friends... Play alone... It's all good fun! the benefit of this game is that if u want to b a survivor then running away from the killer is never boring because you have different play styles because the killer is controlled by a human... same with survivors so being a killer is never boring as well ... Plus different characters have different things and such. Go have fun :)
очень люблю игры такого характера и эта игра лучшая в своей категории, как по мне

Das Game ist einfach Geil gemacht. Zwar das Matchmaking muss nach verbessert werden aber sonst ziemlich gut, Sobald man 4 FReunde hat und zu 5 spielen kann macht es einfach nur spaß was besseres hatte ich seid langem nicht mehr. Holt es euch

Dieses Spiel ist verbuggt und macht null Spaß. Man buggt an Ecken, kann sich nicht bewegen oder wird eh nur gefokust. Im Großen und ganzen einfach ein schlechtes Spiel. Selbst Fortnite macht wahrscheinlich mehr Spaß.
